quotes.message: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
quotes.name: Pat Riley

quotes.message: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.message: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Excellence is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
quotes.name: John W. Gardner

quotes.message: The road to excellence is always under construction.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Superiority -- doing things a little better than anybody else can do them.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: It is quality rather than quantity that matters.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Excellence is rarely found, more rarely valued.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Doing common things uncommonly well.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: With regard to excellence, it is not enough to know, but we must try to have and use it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Excellence encourages one about life generally; it shows the spiritual wealth of the world.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Next to excellence is the appreciation of it.
quotes.name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.message: The sad truth is that excellence makes people nervous.
quotes.name: Shana Alexander

quotes.message: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer.
quotes.name: Rick Pitino

quotes.message: Excellence is about fighting and pursuing something diligently, with a strict and determined approach to doing it right. It's okay if there are flaws in the process - it makes it more interesting.
quotes.name: Charlie Trotter

quotes.message: There is no real excellence in all of this world which can be separated from right living.
quotes.name: David Starr Jordan

quotes.message: Excellence always sells.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Excellence means when a man or woman asks of himself more than others do.
quotes.name: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.message: Those who attain any excellence, commonly spend life in one pursuit; for excellence is not often gained upon easier terms.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The pursuit of excellence is less profitable than the pursuit of bigness, but it can be more satisfying.
quotes.name: David Ogilvy

quotes.message: All human excellence is but comparative. There may be persons who excel us, as much as we fancy we excel the meanest.
quotes.name: Samuel Richardson

quotes.message: Excellence is a process that should occupy all our days.
quotes.name: Theodore Wilhelm Engstrom

quotes.message: He who does it first may do well, but he who does it best will do better.
quotes.name: Scott Allen

quotes.message: The desire of excellence is the necessary attribute of those who excel. We work little for a thing unless we wish for it.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Excellence is an art won by training and habituation. We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly.
quotes.name: Will Durant

quotes.message: Excellence in any department can be attained only by the labor of a lifetime; it is not to be purchased at a lesser price.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Many people can reach for and achieve excellence. To do this consistently is what separates masters and geniuses from everyone else.
quotes.name: Paul Russo

quotes.message: Hunger for excellence. Continuously seek inspiration to make your work better.
quotes.name: Cory Trepanier

quotes.message: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure criticism without resentment.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: True greatness consists in being great in little things.
quotes.name: Charles Simmons

quotes.message: Greatness is not measured by what a man or woman accomplishes, but by the opposition he or she has overcome to reach his goals.
quotes.name: Dorothy Height

quotes.message: Greatness is a road leading towards the unknown.
quotes.name: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.message: There is no excellence without labor. One cannot dream oneself into either usefulness or happiness.
quotes.name: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quotes.message: Whatever you do, don't do it halfway.
quotes.name: Bob Beamon

quotes.message: You do not merely want to be considered just the best of the best. You want to be considered the only ones who do what you do.
quotes.name: Jerry Garcia

quotes.message: Our goal, simply stated, is to be the best.
quotes.name: James H. Robinson

quotes.message: Do more than you're supposed to do and you can have or be or do anything you want.
quotes.name: Bill Sands

quotes.message: We must do the best we can with what we have.
quotes.name: Edward Rowland Sill

quotes.message: The best is the enemy of the good.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Pursue excellence and success will follow.
quotes.name: Rancho

quotes.message: Excellence requires discomfort.
quotes.name: T. D. Jakes

quotes.message: The extent of your impact on the world depends on the size of your devotion to excellence.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: Demand excellence.
quotes.name: Emmitt Smith

quotes.message: Excellence is not a gift, but a skill that takes practice. We do not act rightly because we are excellent in fact we achieve excellence by acting rightly.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: The secret of living a life of excellence is merely a matter of thinking thoughts of excellence. Really, it’s a matter of programming our minds with the kind of information that will set us free.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less than excellent work.
quotes.name: Thomas J Watson

quotes.message: Excellence is to do a common thing in an uncommon way.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: We don’t get a chance to do that many things, and every one should be really excellent. Because this is our life.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Excellence is not an exception; it is a prevailing attitude.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: We must get to the point in our lives. What is the point? To become a new kind of man or woman, having inner command and outer excellence.
quotes.name: Vernon Howard

quotes.message: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word―excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
quotes.name: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.message: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential… these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: If you deliver excellence right now, that gives you the best shot at the best future you’ve got coming.
quotes.name: Robert Forster

quotes.message: If you don’t do it with excellence, don’t do it at all! Because if it’s not excellent, it won’t be profitable or fun.
quotes.name: Robert Townsend

quotes.message: People of excellence go the extra mile to do what's right.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Be driven with purpose. Be relentless in your alignment with excellence. Pay no mind to the disimpassioned impotent haters.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Wealth does not bring about excellence, but excellence makes wealth and everything else good for men, both individually and collectively.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: The price of excellence is discipline.
quotes.name: William Ward

quotes.message: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
quotes.name: Jack Kinder

quotes.message: The greatest enemy of excellence is good.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar
